ch0220_00_matiere/0101_0701_01_10:
Oh! I’ve been waiting for you,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]. ♪
ch0220_00_matiere/0101_0701_02_10:
What do you wanna do today? Go for a walk?
Or maybe a battle?
ch0220_00_matiere/7101_0701_01_10:
Mimi isn’t my Pokémon—just an Espurr that’s a
good friend of mine.
ch0220_00_matiere/7101_0701_02_10:
Whenever I’m working, Mimi’s always willing to
lend me a helping hand! ♪
ch0220_00_matiere/7102_0701_01_10:
I’ve never been to school, so for a while, I hadn’t
met any teachers...
ch0220_00_matiere/7102_0701_02_10: But I did meet a schoolteacher here on Pasio.
ch0220_00_matiere/7102_0701_03_10:
They’re so strong in battle—and know a lot of
cool things! I was impressed!
ch0220_00_matiere/7103_0701_01_10:
Back in Lumiose—and even here on Pasio—
Mr. Looker likes to drink coffee at cafés!
ch0220_00_matiere/7103_0701_02_10:
Coffee smells nice and all, but it tastes so bad!
It’s bitter and sour!
ch0220_00_matiere/7104_0701_01_10:
I’m so happy I get to work with Mr. Looker here
on Pasio!
ch0220_00_matiere/7104_0701_02_10:
But...I’m worried he might just leave without
saying a word to us again, like before.
ch0220_00_matiere/7104_0701_03_10:
You should help me keep an eye on him,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]!
ch0220_00_matiere/7105_0701_01_10:
Hey, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
If you ever need any help, just let me know! ♪
ch0220_00_matiere/7105_0701_02_10:
As head of the Looker Bureau, I’ll be right on
the case!
ch0220_00_matiere/1701_0701_01_10:
Here, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
This is for you! ♪ I found it with Mimi!
ch0220_00_matiere/1701_0702_01_10: If I ever find anything else, I’ll bring it to you! ♪
ch0220_00_matiere/2501_0701_01_10: I used to live in the alleys of Lumiose City...
ch0220_00_matiere/2501_0701_02_10:
But my good friends and Mimi were with me,
so I wasn’t lonely at all!
ch0220_00_matiere/2501_0701_03_10: I gotta say, though, cold days were pretty tough.
ch0220_00_matiere/2501_0701_04_10:
But these days, I have the Looker Bureau, so I’m
warm and cozy now. ♪
ch0220_00_matiere/2501_0702_03_10:
Mimi and I like to sing together when
we’re cleaning! ♪
ch0220_00_matiere/2511_0701_01_10: Sometimes, I miss everyone back in Lumiose City.
ch0220_00_matiere/2511_0701_02_10:
But if I go back to Lumiose, then I won’t be able
to see my friends here on Pasio anymore...
ch0220_00_matiere/2511_0701_03_10: Oof. What should I do about that?
ch0220_00_matiere/2511_0702_01_10:
I hope everyone on Pasio can visit me
in Lumiose City! ♪
ch0220_00_matiere/2511_0702_02_10:
I can give everyone a tour! I know Lumiose like
the back of my hand!
ch0220_00_matiere/3001_0701_01_10:
Waking up early is good! After all, you never
know when you’ll get a new case!
ch0220_00_matiere/3003_0701_01_10:
If I see someone in a bit of trouble, it’s my duty to
help ’em out!
ch0220_00_matiere/3005_0701_01_10:
Beds are already warm, but when you add a
Pokémon to them, they get even warmer!
